name: Some Slime TurnBased Game
description:
This is my prototype of the  TBS game . It's more of the learning project but one can have some fun with it . All of the characters are slimes couse i can't draw  anything more complex.

For all sugestions / quastions / critisism / spelling mistakes  just message me on Discord  (link  https://discord.gg/mpFxaHA )

Also if you  want me to send a source code of the project,  just let me know.   (Engine:  Unity, C#)
